title: $:/plugins/sq/links-context-menu
author: Saq Imtiaz
name: Links Context Menu
readme:
@@color:red;''Highly experimental - no support available. Use at your own risk.''@@

* Adds an extensible and customisable context menu for links to tiddlers.
* Display the browser default contextmenu by using the <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> key.
* Add entries to the menu by adding tiddlers with the tag <<tag $:/tags/links-context-menu/menuitems>>
** For an example see [[$:/plugins/sq/links-context-menu/menuitems/new-window]]
